name: Puzzle Up - Magic Puzzles
description:
Puzzles are evolving. Are you up to the challenge? Welcome to Puzzle Up, the casual puzzler experience that shakes-up the humble puzzler and puts you in the driving seat!

In Puzzle Up, you'll solve beautiful puzzles that come to life and move as you attempt to put all the pieces together! It's a soothing experience that completely changes the puzzle as we know it. It's challenging, relaxing, and powerful, but most importantly, it's so much FUN! Explore Puzzle Up and discover a fresh joy in something as simple and satisfying as the puzzle.

Say good-bye to boredom because there are countless puzzles to attempt, and every single one is as unique as it is beautiful. You'll go from piecing together a marvelous jellyfish as it swims through the ocean to solving a set of striking moving lips, to completing vast plumes of cascading smoke! Remember, If you can think it, we can puzzle it up!

Every puzzle in Puzzle Up also functions as an exclusive 'living wallpaper' for you to make your phone stand out. Living wallpapers continually move on your mobile phone as they do in the game to create an awe-inspiring effect that you can take on the move. Now, when you find a puzzle that speaks to you, you can set it as your wallpaper and let it speak to the world! Tell your friends and show off your originality and show off your favorite puzzles, trust us - your phone will be the talking point. If you prefer your wallpaper a little more static, you can also set every image as a regular wallpaper too.

Explore beautiful landscapes, crazy imagery, and astonishing puzzles as you enjoy this refreshing reimagining of a classic activity!

Subscribe to Premium to enjoy exclusive content!
The app contains the following subscription options:

- Monthly with a 7-day free trial at $4.99.
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
- The account is charged for renewal within 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.
- The cost of renewal is equal to the value that “Apple’s App Store Matrix” determines as the equivalent of the subscription price in $USD.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.
